column1: * 1955 - The fifth episode of The Lord of the Rings (1955 radio series) of The Fellowship of the Ring airs on the BBC Third Programme.
* 1971 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to George and Moira Sayer (11 December 1971).
* 2014 - The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies is released in New Zealand.
